name: Milo is dating
description:
Guide Milo in this Text-Based Adventure…

Milo needs your help. They have come to Earth from another universe in the hopes of finding love. The only dating knowledge they possess is what you guide them to learn that day. Unfortunately, that knowledge comes from Reddit, a paranoid war vet and daytime television.

In this off beat comedy with a heart, you will guide Milo to find a date, research dating advice and choose what techniques they will apply on their special evening. Tactics that may work for some, may not for others, as Milo will find out, either way hilarity and embarrassment ensues.

Play through 18 unique endings…

Will you let Milo surprise their date in a wedding dress, give therapy to a therapist, become a monster, impersonate a celebrity or perhaps say all the wrong things and end up without a date at all?

You have the potential to run this date perfectly well, or perfectly… weird. Or maybe both! And your date might be into that ;)

Dating is all about finding your brand of weird and enjoying the company of the many other brands you meet along the way!

Help Milo learn what it means to date on Earth where nothing makes sense, everything is foreign and, according to Reddit - sending dick pics is a good idea!

As my friend said about 'Milo is dating': “Will probably make you cry from awkwardness, this game is down to earth and relatable - because who can’t relate to creating a baby from thin air?!”

So jump on board and help Milo find love and get weird along the way!
